Dots

Class DotsPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dots.DotsPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DotsPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Object to track the index in a 2D array where a dot is positioned, NOT in PIXELS Created by JiaHao on 10/2/15.
    See Also:
